name: EZlocal
tag_list: search, local-search, local-business-search, local-directory, local, local-business-directory, free-business-listings
overview:
EZlocal is a local business search engine. Their database of over 16 million U.S. business listings has structured profiles to describe the company names, business types and contact information. Profiles can include driving directions, hours of operation, menus, brands, products and services, coupons and payment types accepted. It also lets consumers provide user-generated reviews and ratings of local businesses.

In addition to the local search engine, EZlocal also offers a paid membership. Paying members will be manually submitted to many other local search engines and directories, such as Google, Yahoo, Bing, Superpages, Citysearch, etc.
